item.description: Come join us for a fun time.  Don’t worry if you have never done it before, we’re only playing for fun!  Afterward, we’ll go nearby for refreshments.  Dues paying Members $8, Guests $10.  To reserve, call Gail at 860-434-6426 or 860-582-8229.  Directions to 2340 Wilbur Cross Highway:  Berlin Turnpike (Rt. 5/15) becomes Wilbur Cross Highway when heading from Berlin toward Meriden, facility opposite Hawthorn Inn, look for giraffes and elephants up on right bank.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting for you in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Miniature Golf
